$l['formvalidator_make_email'] = 'Is not an e-mail address';
$l['formvalidator_make_filled'] = 'Is empty';
$l['formvalidator_make_image'] = 'No image';

$l['formvalidator_make_min'] = 'Is less than {0}';
$l['formvalidator_make_min_string'] = 'Is shorter than {0} characters';

$l['formvalidator_make_numeric'] = 'Is not numeric';
$l['formvalidator_make_present'] = 'Is not present';
$l['formvalidator_make_regex'] = 'Does not match the regex "{0}"';

$l['formvalidator_make_size'] = 'Does not match {0}';
